title: Dark mode theme option
description: It would be great to have a dark mode theme to reduce eye strain during long work sessions. Many modern applications now support this feature and it's become a standard user expectation.

title: Export data to CSV
description: Allow users to export their data in CSV format for external analysis and reporting purposes.

title: Mobile app crashing on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately when opening on iOS 17. This started happening after the latest update.

title: Keyboard shortcuts for power users
description: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions like creating new items, searching, and navigation to improve productivity for power users.

title: Slow loading on dashboard
description: Dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load with large datasets. Performance optimization needed.

title: Integration with Slack notifications
description: Would love to receive notifications in our Slack channel when important updates happen in the application.

title: Better mobile experience
description: The mobile web version needs improvements in terms of touch interactions and responsive design.

title: Bulk actions for data management
description: Allow users to select multiple items and perform bulk actions like delete, edit, or move to improve efficiency.

title: Search filters not working properly
description: The advanced search filters are not applying correctly and returning incorrect results.

title: Two-factor authentication
description: Add 2FA support for enhanced security. This is becoming essential for business applications.
